name: Soul Connection by Mael Barbosa
description:
“The work itself talks about a connection between two people that goes beyond an intellectual connection, or corporeal connection (physical attraction), but a supernatural connection. This connection can only be two soul mates. They are two souls that complement each other like no one else in the world can complement each other, a more than perfect connection, it's as if they've known each other for a long time. These are feelings that echo from somewhere in the past, even if you haven't met the person yet. This soul connection is not just a loving relationship, between a couple, whether heterosexual or homosexual, but also a friendship relationship between two people."

@napstudio.br
